item.title: Dilbert Hates Group
item.description: Multiple newspapers around the U.S. dropped Scott Adams’s long-running “Dilbert” comic strip after the cartoonist called Black Americans a “hate group” https://t.co/9Ei6HhdHHN — The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2023

item.title: Lab Leak with no Consensus
item.description: 🌏 Lab Leak Most Likely Origin of Covid-19 Pandemic, U.S. Agency Now Says Energy Department’s revised assessment is based on new intelligence vs. White House Says No Consensus on Covid Origin Comments follow Energy Department assessment that pandemic likely started with leak from Chinese lab
